LLMDecisionAgent.name: initialize_round
LLMDecisionAgent.description: Resets the stamina of each agent to the default value and prepares the environment for the next round of actions.

required_variables.name: stamina_reset_value
required_variables.description: The default stamina value to which each agent's stamina is reset at the start of each round.

output_updates.name: current_stamina
output_updates.description: The stamina of the agent is reset to the default value.

ClaimAgent.name: process_claims
ClaimAgent.description: Processes the claims made by agents on unowned plots, resolving any contention through a seeded random number generator.

required_variables.name: unowned_plots
required_variables.description: A list of plots that are currently unowned.

required_variables.name: claim_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to claim unowned plots.

output_updates.name: successful_claims
output_updates.description: The number of successful claims processed in the round.

output_updates.name: failed_claims
output_updates.description: The number of failed claims due to contention or other issues.

output_updates.name: new_owners
output_updates.description: List of agent IDs who have become new plot owners.

output_updates.name: truce_windows
output_updates.description: List of plots with active truce windows.

RaidAgent.name: process_raids
RaidAgent.description: Processes the raids made by agents on owned plots, resolving any defense or contention through a seeded random number generator.

required_variables.name: owned_plots
required_variables.description: A list of plots that are currently owned.

required_variables.name: raid_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to raid owned plots.

required_variables.name: defense_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to defend owned plots.

output_updates.name: successful_raids
output_updates.description: The number of successful raids carried out in the round.

output_updates.name: failed_raids
output_updates.description: The number of raids that were blocked by defense.

DefendAgent.name: setup_defenses
DefendAgent.description: Sets up defenses on plots to prevent raids or influence mining outcomes.

required_variables.name: owned_plots
required_variables.description: A list of plots that are currently owned.

required_variables.name: defense_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to defend owned plots.

output_updates.name: defended_plots
output_updates.description: List of plots that have been marked as defended.

MineAgent.name: perform_mining
MineAgent.description: Performs mining on plots based on the predeclared mining allocations, respecting the per-plot cap and ownership status.

required_variables.name: owned_plots
required_variables.description: A list of plots that are currently owned.

required_variables.name: mine_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to mine owned plots.

required_variables.name: defended_plots
required_variables.description: List of plots that have been marked as defended.

output_updates.name: total_gold_mined
output_updates.description: Total amount of gold mined in the round.

output_updates.name: idle_plots
output_updates.description: Number of plots where mining did not occur.

MineAgent.name: update_defended_status
MineAgent.description: Updates the status of defended plots' mining outcomes and logs the results.

required_variables.name: defended_plots
required_variables.description: List of plots that have been marked as defended.

required_variables.name: mine_actions
required_variables.description: A list of actions submitted by agents to mine owned plots.

output_updates.name: defended_mining_results
output_updates.description: List containing details of mining results for defended plots.
